Key Match Events: Denmark opened the scoring with a goal from a corner kick within the first 90 seconds.
Christian Eriksen scored the winning goal in stoppage time to secure the victory.
The match was intense with a fast-paced first half and continued pressure from Denmark.
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark had a strong home record with 13 wins in their previous 15 matches.
The team was brimming with confidence and aimed to use their strengths effectively.
Post-Match Reflections: The win provided a morale boost for Denmark ahead of the EURO 2024.
Denmark will host Norway next, while Sweden's summer ends with a match against Serbia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christian Eriksen was named Flashscore Man of the Match.
The match stats and Eriksen's performance were highlighted post-game.
